00020 
00021 fastMappingIProcessor::fastMappingIProcessor(): VRawADCValueProcessor("fastMappingIProcessor") {
00022 
00023   _description = "This processor reads rawCalorimeterHits and applies part I of the mapping.";
00024 
00025   registerProcessorParameter("OutputCollectionName", "Name of the output collection",
00026                            _outputColName, std::string("CaliceHitsLevel1"));
00027                            
00028   registerProcessorParameter("ViewMapping", 
00029                              "View the mapping between channels and modules when ever the module location or module connection conditions data change (set to 0 or !=0)",
00030                              _viewConnectionTree,
00031                              0);
00032   registerProcessorParameter("PickModule",
00033                              "Select only a single module",
00034                              _pickModule,
00035                              0);                             
00036 }

00038 
00039 void fastMappingIProcessor::init() {
00040 
00041   std::stringstream message;
00042   message << "undefined conditionsdata: ";
00043   bool error=false;
00044   try {
00045     VRawADCValueProcessor::init();
00046   }
00047   catch (ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler &conddata_error) {
00048     // --- catch conditions data handler registration errors
00049     //   ... and build a combined error message.
00050     std::string a(conddata_error.what());
00051     error=true;
00052     if (a.size()>0) {
00053       a.erase(a.size()-1);
00054       message << a; 
00055     }
00056   }
00057   if (error) { 
00058     message <<  ".";
00059     throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00060   }
00061   _mapping.setViewConnectionTree(_viewConnectionTree!=0);
00062   printParameters();
00063 }

00070 void fastMappingIProcessor::processEvent(LCEvent* evt) {
00071 
00072   try {
00073     LCCollection* inCol = evt->getCollection(_adcColName);
00074     LCCollectionVec* outCol = new LCCollectionVec( LCIO::RAWCALORIMETERHIT );
00075     LCFlagImpl hitFlag( outCol->getFlag() );
00076     hitFlag.setBit( LCIO::RCHBIT_TIME );
00077     hitFlag.setBit( LCIO::CHBIT_ID1 );
00078     outCol->setFlag( hitFlag.getFlag() );
00079     EVENT::LCParameters & theParam = outCol->parameters();
00080     theParam.setValue(LCIO::CellIDEncoding,HcalTileIndex::getEncodingString(0));
00081     outCol->setFlag(hitFlag.getFlag());
00082 
00083     for (int i = 0; i < inCol->getNumberOfElements(); i++) {
00084       AdcBlock* adcBlock = static_cast<AdcBlock*>( inCol->getElementAt(i) );
00085 //      AdcBlock* _adcBlock = static_cast<AdcBlock*>(inVector->getElementAt(i));
00086       short crate = adcBlock->getCrateID();
00087       short slot = adcBlock->getSlotID();       
00088       short fe = adcBlock->getBoardFrontEnd();
00089       short channel = adcBlock->getMultiplexPosition();
00090       std::pair<UInt_t,UInt_t> moduleIndices = _mapping.getModuleIndex( crate, slot, fe );
00091 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00092       std::cout << "fastMappingIProcessor::processEvent() ";
00093       std::cout << crate << "/" << slot << "/" << fe << " -> " << moduleIndices.first << ", " << moduleIndices.second << std::endl; 
00094 #endif
00095           if ( moduleIndices.first == UINT_MAX) continue;
00096           if ( moduleIndices.second == UINT_MAX) continue;
00097 
00098       /*
00099         unsigned short _moduleIDs[2];
00100         unsigned short _moduleTypes[2];
00101         if (_moduleIndices.first!=UINT_MAX) {
00102         _moduleIDs[0] = (_mapping.getModuleID(_moduleIndices.first) << 8) + 
00103         (unsigned short)_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndices.first)-4;
00104         _moduleTypes[0] = (unsigned short)_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndices.first)-4;
00105         }                   
00106         if (_moduleIndices.second!=UINT_MAX) {
00107         _moduleIDs[1] = (_mapping.getModuleID(_moduleIndices.second) << 8) + 
00108         (unsigned short)_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndices.second)-4;
00109         _moduleTypes[1] = (unsigned short)_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndices.second)-4;
00110         }       
00111       */            
00112       for (short kadc = 0; kadc < 12; kadc++) {
00113         try {
00114           short chip = kadc;
00115           UInt_t moduleIndex; // = moduleIndices.first;
00116           UInt_t module; //  = _mapping.getModuleID( moduleIndices.second);
00117           UInt_t moduleType; // = HcalTileIndex( module, chip, 0 ).getModuleType();
00118 
00119           if ( chip<=5 ) {
00120             moduleIndex = moduleIndices.first;
00121             module = (UInt_t)_mapping.getModuleID( moduleIndices.first );
00122             moduleType = (UInt_t)_mapping.getModuleType( moduleIndices.first );
00123           } else {
00124             moduleIndex = moduleIndices.second;
00125             module = (UInt_t)_mapping.getModuleID( moduleIndices.second );
00126             moduleType = (UInt_t)_mapping.getModuleType( moduleIndices.second );
00127           }
00128           /* fixme: make sure that both parts of module are connected to the same FE */
00129           /* check if module index is in data base, if not, ignore ADCValue */
00130 
00131           float energy = adcBlock->getAdcVal( kadc );
00132           if ( ( moduleIndex != UINT_MAX) && 
00133                (!_pickModule || ( moduleIndex == (UInt_t)_pickModule )) &&
00134                // quick fix to remove "virtual" cells from coarse modules, which seem to be read out and converted
00135                // to be done: introduce validity flag for cells in ModuleDescription or use a map instead of a vector to relate
00136                // cells to chip/channel
00137                !(( moduleType==6) && ( chip>3)) &&
00138                !(( moduleType==7) && ( chip<8)) &&
00139                !(( moduleType==7) && ( chip==8) && ( channel<3))) {
00140             
00141             FastCaliceHit *aFastCaliceHit = new FastCaliceHit( module, 
00142                                                                chip, 
00143                                                                channel, 
00144                                                                energy, 0., 0 );
00145 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00146             std::cout << "mappingIProcessor::processEvent() ";
00147             aFastCaliceHit->print(std::cout);
00148             std::cout << std::endl;
00149 #endif
00150             if ( aFastCaliceHit ) outCol->addElement( aFastCaliceHit ); 
00151           }
00152         }
00153         catch(Exception& e) { 
00154           std::cout << " Exception: " << e.what() << std::endl;
00155         }
00156       }
00157     }
00158     evt->addCollection( outCol, _outputColName );
00159   }
00160   catch(DataNotAvailableException &e) {
00161   }  
00162 }
